sentences.text: March 16, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of LKQ Corporation at 135 South LaSalle Street, 43rd Floor, Chicago, Illinois 60603 at 1:30 p.m., Central Time, on May 8, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement describe the business to be transacted at the meeting and provide other information concerning LKQ that you should be aware of when you vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal business of the Annual Meeting will be to elect directors, to ratify the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm, to hold an advisory vote on executive compensation and to hold an advisory vote on the frequency of holding an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also plan to review the status of the Companys business at the meeting and answer any questions you may have.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is important that your shares are represented at the Annual Meeting whether or not you plan to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure that you will be represented, we ask that you vote your shares as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors and management, we would like to express our appreciation for your investment in LKQ Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Robert L. Wagman President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Joseph M. Holsten Executive Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dominick Zarcone Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON MAY 8, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice is hereby given that the 2017 Annual Meeting of the Stockholders of LKQ Corporation will be held at 135 South LaSalle Street, 43rd Floor, Chicago, Illinois 60603 on Monday, May 8, 2017 at 1:30 p.m., Central Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of our 2017 Annual Meeting is to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Elect ten directors for the ensuing year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Ratify the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Hold an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Hold an advisory vote on the frequency of holding an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Transact such other business as may be properly brought before the 2017 Annual Meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to take advantage of the Securities and Exchange Commission rule allowing companies to furnish proxy materials to stockholders over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this e-proxy process lowers our costs and reduces the environmental impact of our Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 16, 2017, we began mailing to certain stockholders a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials containing instructions on how to access our proxy materials and how to vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other stockholders will receive the proxy materials by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting in person or by proxy if you were a stockholder of record on March 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend, please review our proxy materials and submit your vote by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions for voting are included in this Proxy Statement and in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time prior to its use at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Victor M. Casini Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary March 16, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INTRODUCTION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have sent you this Proxy Statement because our Board of Directors is soliciting your proxy to vote your shares of the common stock of LKQ Corporation at our upcoming annual meeting of stockholders for 2017 (the 2017 Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement, the words LKQ, Company, we, our, ours, and us refer to LKQ Corporation and its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with rules promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC), the information below included under the captions Report of the Audit Committee and Compensation Committee Report will not be deemed to be filed or to be proxy soliciting material or incorporated by reference in any prior or future filings by us under the Securities Act of 1933 or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the Exchange Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION ABOUT THE ANNUAL MEETING AND VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials for the Stockholder Meeting to be Held on Monday, May 8, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 (the 2016 Annual Report) and this Proxy Statement are available at: https://materials.proxyvote.com/501889.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to rules adopted by the SEC, we have elected to provide access to our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to the owners of our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders have the ability to access our proxy materials on the website referred to in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials or request to receive a printed set of our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access our proxy materials over the Internet or to request a printed copy of our proxy materials may be found in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, stockholders may request to receive proxy materials in printed form on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this process should expedite your receipt of our proxy materials and reduce the environmental impact of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are mailing the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to our stockholders on or about March 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Date, Time and Place of the Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting will be held on Monday, May 8, 2017, at 1:30 p.m., Central Time, at 135 South LaSalle Street, 43rd Floor, Chicago, Illinois 60603.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To obtain directions to attend the meeting, please contact our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our principal xecutive offices are located at 500 West Madison Street, Suite 2800, Chicago, Illinois 60661 (telephone: 312-621-1950).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission o the meeting is limited to our stockholders (or their proxy holders) and other invited guests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Purpose of the Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the 2017 Annual Meeting is to vote on the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. The election of ten directors, each to serve for a term of one year (or until his or her successor is duly elected and qualified);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. The ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for our fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. On an advisory basis, executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. On an advisory basis, the frequency of holding an advisory vote on executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. The transaction of any other business properly brought before the 2017 Annual Meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who Can Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record at the close of business on March 16, 2017, the record date, will be entitled to notice of and to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 7, 2017 (the latest practicable date prior to mailing), there were 308,214,794 shares of our common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A list of the stockholders entitled to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting will be open to the examination of any of our stockholders, for any purpose germane to the 2017 Annual Meeting, during ordinary business hours, for a period of at least ten days prior to the 2017 Annual Meeting at our principal executive offices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of our common stock is entitled to one vote on each matter to be voted on at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How You Can Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote in one of the following three ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the Internet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Go to www.proxyvote.com 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and follow the instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the 12 or 16-digit control number that is included in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, proxy card or voting instruction form that is sent to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The internet voting system allows you to confirm that the system has properly recorded your votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This method of voting will be available up until 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT on May 7, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Call toll-free 1-800-690-6903, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and follow the instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the 12 or 16-digit control number that is included in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, proxy card or voting instruction form that is sent to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As with internet voting, you will be able to confirm that the system has properly recorded your votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This method of voting will be available up until 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT on May 7, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record and you elect to receive your proxy materials by mail, you can vote by marking, dating and signing your proxy card exactly as your name appears on the card and returning it by mail in the postage-paid envelope that will be provided to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name and you elect to receive your proxy materials by mail, you can vote by completing and mailing the voting instruction form that will be provided by your bank, broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should mail the proxy card or voting instruction form in plenty of time to allow delivery prior to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Do not mail the proxy card or voting instruction form if you are voting over the internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote before the 2017 Annual Meeting, the named proxies will vote your shares as you direct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you send in your proxy card or voting instruction form or use Internet voting but do not specify how you want to vote your shares, the proxies will vote your shares in accordance with how the Board of Directors recommends that you vote as set forth below under How the Board Recommends that You Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How the Board Recommends that You Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends that you vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR all of the nominees for election to the Board of Directors in Proposal No. 1 - Election of our Board of Directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR Proposal No. 2 - Ratification of appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR Proposal No. 3 - Approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our named executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the option every year in Proposal No. 4, on an advisory basis, as the frequency of the advisory vote on executive ompensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How You May Revoke or Change Your Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder whose shares are registered in your name, you may revoke your proxy at any time before it is voted by one of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting another proper proxy with a more recent date than that of the proxy first given by following the Internet voting instructions or completing, signing, dating and returning a proxy card;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sending written notice of revocation to our Corporate Secretary; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the 2017 Annual Meeting and voting by ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through a broker, bank or other nominee, you may revoke your proxy by following instructions the broker, bank or other nominee provides.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum Requirement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the 2017 Annual Meeting, in person or represented by proxy, of a majority of the outstanding shares of our common stock as of the record date will constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by broker non-votes and by proxies marked abstain are counted in determining whether a quorum is present for the transaction of business at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote is a proxy submitted by a broker that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: does not indicate a vote for some or all of the proposals because the broker does not have discretionary voting authority on certain types of proposals and has not received instructions from its client as to how to vote on a particular proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal No. 1 -- Election of our Board of Directors, you may vote for, against or abstain with respect to the election of each director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election, each director will be elected by a vote of the majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of votes cast means the number of votes cast for a directors election exceeds the number of votes cast against that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will not treat as a vote cast any share that is otherwise present at the meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) but for which there is an abstention, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) as to which a stockholder gives no authority or direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In a contested election, the directors will be elected by a plurality of the votes cast, meaning the directors receiving the largest number of for votes will be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A contested election is one in which:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as of the last day for giving notice of a stockholder nominee, a stockholder has nominated a candidate for director according to the requirements of our Bylaws; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as of the date that notice of the meeting is given, the Board of Directors considers that a stockholder candidacy has created a bona fide election contest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election, a nominee who does not receive a majority vote will not be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee for director is not elected and the nominee is an incumbent director, the director must tender his or her resignation to the Board of Directors, subject to acceptance by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Normally, the Governance/Nominating Committee will make a recommendation to the Board of Directors as to whether to accept or reject the tendered resignation or whether other action should be taken.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors will act on the tendered resignation, taking into account the Governance/Nominating Committees recommendation, and publicly disclose its decision regarding the tendered resignation and the rationale behind the decision within 90 days from the date of the certification of the election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance/Nominating Committee in making its recommendation and the Board of Directors n making its decision may each consider any factors or other information that they consider appropriate and relevant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director who tenders his or her resignation will not participate in the recommendation of the Governance/Nominating Committee or the decision of the Board of Directors with respect to his or her resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors may decrease the size of the Board or may fill any vacancy resulting from the non-election of a director as provided in our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional details about this process are specified in our Bylaws, which are available on our website at www.lkqcorp.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposals No. 2 and 3, you may vote for, against or abstain with respect to each proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each proposal will be decided by the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal No. 3 is an advisory vote only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions are counted in tabulations of the votes cast on proposals presented to stockholders other than elections of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, an abstention from voting on a matter has the same legal effect as a vote against that matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes and directions to withhold authority are counted as present, but are deemed not entitled to vote on proposals for which brokers do not have discretionary authority and, therefore, have no effect, other than to reduce the number of affirmative votes needed to approve a proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal No. 4 -- Advisory Vote on the Frequency of Holding an Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation, you may vote for a frequency of "yearly," "every other year" or "every three years" or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option of one, two or three years that receives the highest number of votes cast will be the frequency for the advisory vote on executive compensation that has been selected by the stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have appointed a representative of Broadridge Financial Solutions as our independent inspector of election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The representative will determine whether a quorum is present and will tabulate all votes cast at our 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discretionary Voting and Adjournments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently are not aware of any business to be acted upon at the 2017 Annual Meeting other than that described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, however, other matters properly are brought before the 2017 Annual Meeting, or any adjournment or postponement of the 2017 Annual Meeting occurs, your proxy includes discretionary authority on the part of the individuals appointed to vote your common stock or act on those matters according to their best judgment, including to adjourn the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting may be adjourned for the purpose of, among other things, soliciting additional proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting may be adjourned from time to time by approval of the holders of common stock representing a majority of the votes present in person or by proxy at the 2017 Annual Meeting, whether or not a quorum exists, without further notice other than by an announcement made
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently do not intend to seek an adjournment of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL NO. 1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF OUR BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ten directors are to be elected at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have designated the persons named below as nominees for election as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If elected, they will serve for a term expiring at our annual meeting of stockholders in 2018 or until their successors are elected and qualified or until their earlier death, resignation, disqualification or removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees (except Dominick Zarcone) are serving as directors as of the date of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you otherwise instruct us, your properly executed proxy that is returned in a timely manner will be voted for election of these ten nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, however, any of these nominees should be unable or should fail to act as a nominee because of an unexpected occurrence, your proxy will be voted for such other person as the holders of your proxy, acting in their discretion, may determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the alternative, the Board of Directors may reduce the number of directors to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The names of the nominees, and certain information about them, are set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Name  Age  Director Since  Position(s) Sukhpal Singh Ahluwalia  58  November 2014  Chairman of Euro Car Parts Limited A. Clinton Allen  73  May 2003  Lead Independent Director Robert M. Hanser  63  November 2015  Director Joseph M. Holsten  64  February 1999  Executive Chairman of the Board Blythe J. McGarvie  60  March 2012  Director Paul M. Meister  64  February 1999  Director John F. O'Brien  73  July 2003  Director Guhan Subramanian  46  January 2013  Director William M. Webster, IV  59  June 2003  Director Dominick Zarcone  58  *  Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer *
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: * In connection with the selection of Mr. Zarcone to succeed Robert L. Wagman as Chief Executive Officer, the Board of Directors also nominated Mr. Zarcone for election as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Wagman is not standing for re-election as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Biographical information concerning our ten nominees is presented below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sukhpal Singh Ahluwalia.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ahluwalia was elected to our Board of Directors in November 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, he became the Chairman of our United Kingdom operations in November 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 1978, Mr. Ahluwalia founded Euro Car Parts Limited, a distributor of aftermarket mechanical vehicle replacement parts in the U.K., and served as its Managing Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LKQ Corporation acquired Euro Car Parts in October 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ahluwalia continued serving as the Managing Director of Euro Car Parts until June 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also is Chairman of Dominvs Group, a London-based company specializing in the acquisition, development and management of commercial, industrial, hospitality and residential property across the U.K. On October 5, 2008, a Joint Administrator was appointed under the U.K. Insolvency Act 1986 for Euro Car Parts Logistics Limited, a company of which Mr. Ahluwalia had been a director.

sentences.text: Nominating Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance/Nominating Committee will consider recommendations for nominees for directorships submitted by stockholders and will apply the same evaluation to such recommendations submitted by stockholders as to recommendations submitted by any other person or entity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance/Nominating Committee operates under a written charter, which is available on our corporate website at www.lkqcorp.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter includes a statement of the competencies and personal attributes of nominees to the Board of Directors to be used as a guideline in connection with their evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of the competencies and personal attributes that the Governance/Nominating Committee considers include a nominees experience, general judgment and knowledge, grasp of the Companys business, understanding of the function of the Board to represent stockholders interests, willingness to devote adequate time to board duties, ability to effectively communicate, and demonstration of vision and leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In identifying nominees for director, the Governance/Nominating Committee seeks persons with diverse and complementary (as opposed to overlapping) competencies and attributes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance/Nominating Committee does not favor or disfavor any particular nominee on the basis of race, religion, gender, age or national origin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who wish the Governance/Nominating Committee to consider their recommendations for nominees for the position of director should submit their recommendations in writing to the Governance/Nominating Committee in care of the Corporate Secretary of the Company at the Companys principal executive offices, as described in the section below entitled Other Information - - Submitting Your Proposals for the 2018 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines establish our corporate governance principles and practices on a variety of topics, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board composition, independence and membership criteria
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Length of board service and the review process upon a change in status of a director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board meeting procedures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board committees, committee membership selection, and committee functions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director rights and responsibilities, including access to information, the retention of independent experts, orientation and education programs, an annual evaluation of its governance practices, and risk oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Evaluation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, each year the Chairman of the Board interviews each director to obtain his or her assessment of the effectiveness of he Board and its committees, director performance, board dynamics, and the relationship with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of such nterviews are summarized and presented to the Board of Directors for discussion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the chair of each Board committee annually conducts an evaluation with the committee members of the performance and procedures of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have different persons in the roles of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holsten has been our Chairman of the Board since November 2011 and was appointed our Executive Chairman on March 6, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Wagman has been our Chief Executive Officer since January 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recently selected Mr. Zarcone, our Chief Financial Officer, to become Chief Executive Officer upon the resignation of Mr. Wagman, who has announced his intention to step down for health reasons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this leadership structure is appropriate for our Company because our Chairman of the Board and our Chief Executive Officer complement each other in their common objective of promoting the best interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holsten led our Company as its top executive from November 1998 through December 2011 (as the Co-Chief Executive Officer during the 2011 calendar year), after which he retired from his officer position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He had assumed the Chairman of the Board position shortly after the death of Donald Flynn, the former Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holsten brings to the Executive Chairman of the Board position a great deal of experience operating companies and also has a strong financial accounting background.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Wagman has worked in our industry for almost 30 years and adds his extensive knowledge of the operations side of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Holsten and Wagman have been able to apply their different yet complementary strengths to give the Board of Directors a unique perspective with respect to the key
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: business issues that arise and help the Board to make well-informed decisions regarding such issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes this will continue to be the case with Mr.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Zarcone as the Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has designated A. Clinton Allen as our Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Allen leads the executive sessions of our independent directors and focuses particular attention on our corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that in fulfilling this role Mr. Allen complements the strengths of our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer described above and strengthens our Boards leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Board of Directors in Our Risk Management Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have well developed processes in place to manage our key strategic, operational, financial, and compliance risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our entire Board of Directors is responsible for monitoring and evaluating the risks we face and our risk management processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We implement our risk management processes through the periodic disclosure to the Board of such risks by each of our Chairman of the Board and our Chief Executive Officer and other appropriate executives (including our Chief Financial Officer and our General Counsel) with respect to such matters as acquisitions, capital raising transactions, financial accounting matters and legal issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our annual strategic planning and budgeting process includes identification of risks and a sensitivity analysis, which is reviewed with our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Audit department develops a risk-based audit plan annually that is reviewed with our Audit Committee, along with the results of internal audit reviews and activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the Boards oversight of risks is enhanced by our leadership structure because the Board often receives more than one point of view regarding the risks, thereby leading to a more thorough analysis of the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, following consideration of all relevant facts and circumstances and upon recommendation of the Governance/Nominating Committee, has affirmatively determined that each nominee for election as a director (except Messrs. Ahluwahlia, Holsten and Zarcone) is independent in that each such person has no material relationship with the Company, our management or our independent registered public accounting firm, and otherwise meets the independence and other requirements of the listing standards of Nasdaq, the rules and regulations of the SEC and applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining the independence of the directors, the Board considered, among other things, the following transactions:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) in December 2015, the Company entered into a joint venture arrangement with Continental Engines Limited, of which Mr. Ahluwalia is a director, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the Company pays for directors to attend education programs, including programs sponsored by the American College of Corporate Directors, with which Mr. Allen is affiliated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These transactions were entered into in the ordinary course of business and involved the purchase or provision of goods or services at arms-length negotiated rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board has determined that these transactions were not material relationships under the Nasdaq rules and do not otherwise impair the independence of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board determined that Mr. Ahluwahlia is not independent due to his status as Chairman of our United Kingdom operations, that Mr. Holsten is not independent due to his status as a consultant to the Company through December 31, 2016, and that Mr. Zarcone is not independent due to his status as a current executive officer of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board held six meetings (four regular and two special) during fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each incumbent director attended at least 75% of the aggregate total number of meetings held by the Board and all committees on which such director served that were held during the period during which such director served as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At its regular meetings, the independent members of the Board typically hold executive sessions without management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four executive sessions were held in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage all of our directors to attend our annual meeting of stockholders, and we customarily schedule a regular Board meeting on the same day as our annual meeting.

sentences.text: The Board has established stock ownership guidelines that provide that each non-employee director is expected to hold a minimum of 20,000 shares (pledged shares do not count toward this minimum) and to provide that such ownership amount would be obtained within five years after first becoming subject to the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our non-employee directors is currently in compliance with the stock ownership requirements.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees functions include selecting our independent registered public accounting firm and recommending that firm for ratification by stockholders; reviewing the arrangements for, and scope of, the independent registered public accounting firms examination of our financial statements; reviewing the activities of our internal audit department; meeting with the independent registered public accounting firm and certain of our officers to review the adequacy and appropriateness of our system of internal control and reporting, our critical accounting policies, and our public financial disclosures; reviewing compliance with our codes of ethics; and performing any other duties or functions deemed appropriate by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is responsible for establishing and making recommendations to the Board of Directors regarding compensation to be paid to our executive officers and is responsible for the administration and interpretation of, and the granting of awards under, our incentive compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation of our executive officers is determined through a process involving our Chairman of the Board, our Chief Executive Officer and our Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chief Executive Officer typically determines the proposed compensation of the remaining executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee holds a meeting near the beginning of each calendar year to consider the proposed compensation amounts for that year and to make final determinations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of our Board of Directors is responsible for appointing our independent registered public accounting firm, and for recommending such appointment for stockholder ratification.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche has served as our independent registered public accounting firm since 1998 and also has provided non-audit services from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although ratification is not required by our bylaws or otherwise, our Board of Directors is submitting the selection of Deloitte & Touche to our stockholders for ratification because we value our stockholders views on our independent registered public accounting firm and as a matter of good corporate practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee will consider the outcome of this vote in its decision to appoint an independent registered public accounting firm but is not bound by our stockholders vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if the selection of Deloitte & Touche is ratified, the Audit Committee may change the appointment at any time during the year if it determines a change would be in the best interests of the Company and our stockholders.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a detailed description by our independent registered public accounting firm of the particular services to be provided and the estimated fees for such services and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a report to the committee on at least a quarterly basis regarding the services provided and the fees paid for such services.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL NO. 3 ADVISORY VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guiding principles of our compensation policies and decisions include aligning each executives compensation with our business strategy and the interests of our stockholders and providing incentives needed to attract, motivate and retain key executives who are important to our long-term success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this philosophy, a significant portion of the total incentive compensation for each of our executives is directly related to our earnings and to other performance factors that measure our progress against the goals of our strategic and operating plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders are urged to read the Executive Compensation -- Compensation Discussion and Analysis and Executive Compensation -- Compensation Tables sections of this Proxy Statement, which discuss how our compensation design and practices reflect our compensation philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee and the Board of Directors believe that our compensation design and practices are effective in implementing our guiding principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are required to submit a proposal to stockholders for a (non-binding) advisory vote to approve the compensation of our named executive officers pursuant to Section 14A of the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal, commonly known as a say-on-pay proposal, gives our stockholders the opportunity to express their views on the compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is not intended to address any specific item of compensation, but rather the overall compensation of our named executive officers and the principles, policies and practices described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the following resolution is submitted for stockholder vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the stockholders of LKQ Corporation approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of its named executiv officers as disclosed in the Proxy Statement for the 2017 Annual Meeting, including the Summary Compensation Table and the Compensation Discussion and Analysis set forth in such Proxy Statement and other related tables and disclosures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As this is an advisory vote, the result will not be binding on us, the Board of Directors or the Compensation Committee, although our Compensation Committee will consider, among other things, the outcome of the vote when evaluating our compensation principles, design and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies submitted without direction pursuant to this solicitation will be voted FOR the approval of the compensation of our named executive officers, as disclosed in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that you vote FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the compensation of our named executive officers, as disclosed in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL NO. 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON THE FREQUENCY OF HOLDING AN ADVISORY VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to Section 14A of the Exchange Act, we submitted a proposal to stockholders in May 2011 to vote on whether the stockholder advisory "say-on-pay" vote to approve the compensation of our named executive officers should occur every one, two, or hree years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2011, stockholders decided that the advisory vote on executive compensation should occur every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proposal No. 4 is the resubmission of this question to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may cast your vote on this proposal by choosing every year, every other year, or every three years or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In formulating its recommendation, our Board of Directors considered that an annual (non-binding) advisory vote on executive compensation will allow our stockholders to provide us with direct and timely input on our compensation principles, policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option of every year, every other year, or every three years that receives the highest number of votes cast by stockholders will be the frequency for the advisory vote on executive compensation that has been selected by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as this is an advisory vote, the result will not be binding on us or our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee will consider the outcome of the vote when determining how often we should submit to stockholders an advisory vote to approve the compensation of our named executive officers included in our Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies submitted without direction pursuant to this solicitation will be voted for the option of every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend that you vote for the for the option of every year as the frequency with which stockholders are provided an advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers included in our Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Component Description/Purpose 2016 Highlights Direct Compensation Base Salary Fixed compensation element Salary levels based on market rates, executives experience, responsibilities, and contribution to our development and growth In 2016, the base salary for Mr. Wagman was increased to align more closely with competitive salaries for similarly-situated executives Refer to Elements of Our Compensation Programs - Base Salaries Annual Bonus under Management Incentive Plan (MIP) Cash incentive designed to reward achievement of annual performance objectives 2016 annual bonuses were based 100% on consolidated earnings per share (EPS) goals Our 2016 EPS (as defined in the MIP) was $1.83, versus a target range of $1.77 to $1.80, resulting in bonus payments at one level above each executives target.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity awards include meaningful restrictive covenants (e.g., non-competition, non-solicitation of customers or employees, etc.) that, if violated, would result in forfeiture of unvested awards, shares received upon vesting of awards, or cash proceeds received upon sale of such shares.

sentences.text: Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Commencing in 2011, we have submitted to our stockholders on an annual basis a proposal for a (non-binding) advisory vote to approve the compensation of our named executive officers ("say-on-pay").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee considers, among other things, the outcome of this vote when evaluating our compensation principles, designs and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee decided to continue for 2017 our compensation principles, designs and practices largely unchanged compared to 2016 due in part to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the level of stockholder support received in the advisory vote at our 2016 annual meeting.

sentences.text: Objectives of Our Compensation Programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation programs are intended to enable us to attract, motivate, reward and retain the management talent needed to achieve our corporate objectives in a highly competitive market, and thereby increase stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is our policy to provide incentives to the Companys senior management to achieve both short-term and long-term goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To attain these goals, our policy is to provide a significant portion of executive compensation in the form of at-risk, incentive-based
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that such a policy, which directly aligns the financial interests of management with the financial interests of our stockholders, provides the proper incentives to attract, motivate, reward and retain high quality management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has maintained this policy since we became a public company in October 2003 and believes that the policy has been and continues to be appropriate for a growing company like ours.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee will reevaluate this policy in the event that our growth profile changes over time or in the event that the Compensation Committee identifies other reasons that warrant a change of policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Our Compensation Programs are Designed to Reward
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation programs are designed to reward the executive officers for the overall performance of our Company and the individual performance of each executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, with respect to the overall performance of our Company, we have historically used the growth of the following metrics to measure performance: revenue, consolidated earnings per share, and return on equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to individual performance of an executive officer, we analyze the growth of the performance metrics that most directly relate to such individuals area of responsibility and consider certain subjective factors, including the individuals management and leadership skills, ability to resolve challenges and to overcome obstacles, and overall contribution to our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than for purposes of determining the appropriate value of equity related awards, stock price performance has not been used as a direct factor in determining executive officer compensation because the price of our common stock is subject to a variety of factors outside of the control of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock price performance, however, ultimately affects the value of equity incentive awards held by executive officers, thus aligning their interests with those of other stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Decision-Making
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of the Compensation Committee and Management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management provides to the Compensation Committee historical compensation information relating to our executive officers to aid the deliberations of the Compensation Committee regarding executive officer compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information typically includes historical and proposed base salaries, bonuses, long term incentive awards, equity-based awards, and any other material component of compensation or perquisite.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee takes into account the historical trend of each element of compensation and the total of all of the elements for each year in connection with its decisions about proposed compensation amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Compensation Committee receives recommendations from the Chairman of the Board regarding the compensation of the Chief Executive Officer and receives recommendations from the Chief Executive Officer regarding the compensation of the other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of the Compensation Committees Consultant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has engaged Frederic W. Cook & Co., Inc. (F.W. Cook) as its independent executive compensation advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: F.W. Cook reports directly to the Compensation Committee and does no work for management that is not under the Compensation Committees purview.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has considered the independence of F.W. Cook and determined that its engagement of F.W. Cook did not raise any conflicts of interest with LKQ or any of our directors or executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In October 2015, F.W. Cook conducted a comprehensive review of our executive officer compensation programs.

sentences.text: Elements of Our Compensation Programs, Why We Chose Each Element, and How We Determine the Amount of Each Element
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The elements of our direct compensation programs are base salaries, annual bonus awards, long term incentive awards, and equity incentive grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that this mix of compensation elements best achieves the objectives of our compensation programs and provides appropriate short-term and long-term motivation to our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base Salaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salaries are the fixed components of each executives target total direct compensation opportunity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee considers the following factors when setting the base salary of each of the executive officers: base salaries of executive officers in similar positions at comparable companies; the contributions of the executive officers to the Companys development and growth; and the executive officers experience, responsibilities and position within the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No specific corporate performance measures are considered with respect to base salaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A three-year salary history for the named executive officers is provided in the following table
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) The salaries for the named executive officers were increased in 2017 to align their salaries more closely with similarly-situated executives at the peer companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) The salary for Mr. Wagman was increased in both 2016 and 2017 to align his salary more closely with similarly-situated executives at the peer companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As disclosed previously, Mr. Wagman has indicated his intention to resign as Chief Execut Officer, and the Board has selected Mr. Zarcone to replace him in that role.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) The amount shown for Mr. Zarcone for 2015 represents the actual amount received by him for the nine months he was employed by the Company; his annual salary did not change from 2015 to 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) The salary for Mr. Quinn was increased in March 2015 in connection with his promotion to Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director, LKQ Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount shown for Mr. Quinn for 2015 represents the actual amount received by him, including nine months at his increased salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Bonus Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We offer annual bonus awards under our Management Incentive Plan (MIP) to provide incentives for superior performance over a one-year time horizon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MIP was initially approved by our stockholders in May 2011, and re-approved by our stockholders in May 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the MIP, each participant (including our named executive officers) is eligible to receive a cash payment equal to percentages of the participants base salary at specified threshold, target, and maximum levels of performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the performance metric for our executive officers bonuses was based on the Companys consolidated earnings per share, adjusted for certain items as specified by the Compensation Committee at the time the bonus targets were established.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such adjustments related to amortization expense for acquired intangibles; currency exchange rates; asset impairments; restructuring and acquisition expenses; losses on debt extinguishment; atypical environmental and legal losses; change in fair value of contingent consideration liabilities; expenses related to discontinued operations; other extraordinary, unusual or infrequently occurring items and certain other minor adjustments that for 2016 were immaterial or had no effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The adjustments had the net effect of increasing earnings per share by $0.33 over the reported earnings per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table outlines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the threshold, target, and maximum EPS goals under the bonus program, along with actual EPS achieved for 2016, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) each executives bonus opportunity at threshold, target, and maximum, along with the earned bonus amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long Term Incentive Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We grant performance awards under our Long Term Incentive Plan (LTIP) to certain of our key employees (including our named executive officers).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The LTIP was approved by our stockholders in 2006 and re-approved by our stockholders in 2011 and 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long term incentive awards are designed to reward performance over a three-year period and to create retention incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance periods begin on January 1 and end on December 31 of the third calendar year thereafter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the LTIP, each participant (including our named executive officers) is eligible to receive a cash payment equal to percentages of the participants base salary at specified threshold, target, and maximum levels of performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The earned amount is determined by comparing performance in the final year of the three-year performance period to performance in the year before the commencement of the performance period for three separate measures: adjusted earnings per share, total revenue, and return on equity (ROE).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to 2015, performance periods ran end-to-end, meaning that a new performance period began every third year at the conclusion of the preceding three-year performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the three-year performance period ended December 31, 2014, one-half of earned awards were paid promptly after certification by our Compensation Committee of the actual growth of the target components.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The other half of the performance award was deferred and payable in three equal annual installments (plus interest at the prime rate) after the conclusion of the performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event a participants employment terminates as a result of death, total disability or normal retirement at age 65, the deferred payments accelerate upon termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a change in control, the LTIP provides for acceleration of payments as described below under Potential Payments Upon Termination or Change in Control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2014, we amended the LTIP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) to allow the grant of three year performance awards each year (i.e. overlapping performance periods) instead of the previous practice of granting three year performance awards every three years (i.e. end-to-end performance periods),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) to eliminate the deferred vesting concept (i.e. the full award would be payable at the end of the applicable performance period instead of 50% of the award being paid in equal installments over three years following the end of the performance period),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) to increase, subject to stockholder approval, the maximum dollar amount of any one performance award,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) to allow a pro rata payment of a performance award in the event of a participants death or disability during the applicable performance period, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) to allow continuation of vesting of a performance award in the event of a qualifying retirement during the applicable performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We granted performance awards to our executive officers for the performance period commencing January 1, 2016 and ending December 31, 2018 that may be earned from 0 to 200% of the target award value based on three performance measures:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Payout percentages are calculated based on the weighted sum of the respective actual results of each performance measure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each officers threshold, target, and maximum award opportunity under the 2016-2018 LTIP is outlined in the Grants of Plan- Based Awards table on page 29.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity Incentive Grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity-based awards provide incentives over multi-year time horizons, with vesting schedules of up to five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, equity-based awards are forfeited upon separation of service, providing an incentive to the employee to remain with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We grant equity awards to named executive officers and other key employees typically upon their commencement of employment, in some cases upon their promotion, and annually near the beginning of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual grants are made on the second Friday of January each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When making equity awards, we consider factors specific to each employee such as salary, position and responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also consider factors such as the rate of the Companys development and growth and an estimate of the value of each award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we determine the amount of dilution that we believe would be generally acceptable to our stockholders and correspondingly limit the aggregate number of awards granted each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Compensation Committee approved the issuance of a total of 212,481 RSUs to our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The RSUs included both a performance-based vesting condition and a time-based vesting condition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance-based condition is the report by the Company of positive diluted earnings per share, subject to certain adjustments, during any fiscal year period within five years following the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, these RSUs include a time-based vesting condition, vesting over a three-year period, in equal tranches on each six-month anniversary of the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In all cases, both conditions must be met before any RSUs vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the applicable performance-based condition of an RSU is not met, the RSU is forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance-based condition was met in February 2017, and all applicable RSUs that had previously met the time-based vesting condition vested immediately and the remaining RSUs will vest according to the remaining schedule of the time-based condition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table entitled Grants of Plan-Based Awards for Fiscal Year Ended December 31, 2016 on page 29 sets forth additional information about the grants made in 2016 under the Equity Incentive Plan to our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to be competitive in attracting executive personnel, we provide certain other compensation to our executive officers, including matching contributions for a portion of the executive officers contributions to our retirement plans, payment of life insurance premiums for the benefit of the executive officers, and reimbursement of executive officers for their payment of premiums for disability insurance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See footnote 4 to the Summary Compensation Table for more information regarding these items of other compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a 401(k) plan covering substantially all of our employees, including our named executive officers, who have been employed for at least six months.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 401(k) plan allows participants to defer their eligible compensation in amounts up to the statutory limit each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently make matching contributions equal to 50% of the portion of the participants contributions that does not exceed 6% of the participants eligible compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may, at our sole discretion, make annual profit-sharing contributions on behalf of participants; no such profit-sharing contributions were made in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each participant is fully vested in such participants contributions and any earnings they generate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each 401(k) participant becomes vested in our matching contributions, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any earnings they generate, in the amounts of 50%, 75% and 100% after two, three and four years of service, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each participant becomes vested in our profit sharing contributions, if any, and any earnings they
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: generate, in the amounts of 25%, 50%, 75% and 100% after one, two, three and four years of service, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have a plan for highly compensated employees, or HCEs, that supplements the 401(k) plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our named executive officers are HCEs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tax laws impose a maximum percentage of salary that can be contributed each year by HCEs to our 401(k) plan depending on the participation level of non-HCEs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We adopted the supplemental plan to provide additional opportunities for retirement savings that are restricted by IRS limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The supplemental plan operates similarly to the 401(k) plan except that contributions by HCEs to the supplemental plan are not subject to the statutory maximum percentage, the balance in each HCEs account in the supplemental plan is a general asset of ours, and in the event of our insolvency, the HCE would be a general, unsecured creditor with respect to such amount.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The terms of the supplemental plan limit the maximum annual contribution by each participant to 100% of the HCEs salary (including commissions), bonuses and long term incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants have the choice to invest the funds in their accounts in the supplemental plan from among a specified group of investment funds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A participant is entitled to a distribution of the funds in his or her account in the plan upon either a termination of service or retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Severance Protection
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Severance Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2014, we adopted a Severance Policy for Key Executives (the Severance Policy), including all of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Severance Policy sets forth in a written document the terms and conditions that the Company would normally expect to follow upon an involuntary separation of service of a key executive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believed that it was in the Company's interest to formalize the Severance Policy to provide increased certainty for the executives and the Company in the event of a severance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the formalization of the policy is expected to assist the Company with the recruitment and retention of key executives, provide the Company with important protections, and reduce costs in the event of a dispute.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Severance Policy provides cash severance and other benefits in the event of a termination by the Company without cause or by the Covered Executive with good reason (as each term is defined in the Severance Policy).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For additional information about our Severance Policy, refer to Potential Payments Upon a Change in Control on page 32.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change of Control Agreements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have Change of Control Agreements with certain of our employees, including each of our named executive officers, that provide cash severance and other benefits in the event of a qualifying termination within 12 months prior to or 24 months following a Change of Control, as defined in the agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide these agreements to ensure these executives are able to objectively consider transactions that will benefit stockholders even if it is likely to result in termination of their employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreements have an initial term of three years and will automatically renew for a two year period, unless notice of termination is given by the Company at least 60 days before any such renewal date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The operative provisions of the agreements will apply, however, only if a Change of Control, as defined in the agreements, occurs during the period the agreement is in effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For additional information about our Change of Control Agreements, refer to Potential Payments Upon a Change in Control on page 32.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation-Related Governance Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our named executive officers is subject to stock ownership requirements set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These requirements are to be satisfied within five years of an individual becoming subject to the requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our named executive officers is currently in compliance with the stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The complete guidelines can be found on our website at www.lkqcorp.com (click the Corporate Governance link under Investor Relations).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Insider Trading.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a comprehensive insider trading policy that is applicable to, among others, our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy prohibits trading during quarterly blackout periods and other periods during which material information about us has not been publicly disclosed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hedging/Pledging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys policies prohibit our named executive officers, among others, from engaging in hedging transactions involving our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, shares that are pledged do not count toward the stock ownership requirements of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forfeiture of Equity Awards for Restrictive Covenant Violations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our equity awards generally provide that our executive officers will forfeit to the Company their equity awards, the shares received upon vesting of the equity awards, or the proceeds from the sale of shares received upon vesting of such equity awards if the executive officer violates the restrictive covenants in the award agreements relating to the equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The restrictive covenants prohibit the executive officer from competing with us, soliciting our customers or employees, and improperly using our confidential information for a period continuing at least nine months after the executive officers affiliation with us ceases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee of our Board of Directors makes the final decisions regarding executive compensation and is composed entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Compensation Consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee periodically engages a compensation consultant to advise it regarding executive and director compensation.

sentences.text: Indemnification
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Impact of Regulatory Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code limits the deduction for federal income tax purposes of certain compensation paid in any fiscal year by a publicly-held corporation to its chief executive officer and its three other highest compensated officers (other than its chief financial officer) to $1 million per executive (the $1 million cap).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The $1 million cap does not apply to performance- based compensation as defined under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that annual bonuses paid under our MIP, awards issued under our LTIP, stock options issued under our Equity Incentive Plan, and RSUs issued under our Equity Incentive Plan that include an appropriate performance-based vesting condition qualify as performance-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tax authorities may view some or all of these components of compensation as not performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation that is subject to the $1 million cap paid to our named executive officers exceeded the cap in 2016 for our Chief Executive Officer by an immaterial amount and for our Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director, LKQ Europe by approximately $410,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the Compensation Committee takes into consideration Section 162(m) when making decisions about executive compensation, there is no formal policy regarding the $1 million cap and the compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks Relating to our Compensation Policies and Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have undertaken an analysis of our compensation policies and practices to assess whether risks arising from such policies and practices are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The analysis was performed by our management with oversight by the Compensation Committee of our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We analyzed risks relating to the different components of our compensation structure, to the time horizons of our compensation components, to the goals and objectives used to determine performance-based compensation, to the disparate treatment, if any, among compensation policies and practices of our business units, and to any contractual obligations by us to accelerate the payment of compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on that analysis, we have concluded that the risks arising from our compensation policies and practices are not reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
